MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY12 postcode area of Dunfermline, affecting properties in High Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of it and only became aware of this at 6.39AM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 9.45AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 8.11AM on 07 November 2020.
